translations: 缓慢燃烧的；（情绪）郁积的
闷烧；郁积（smolder 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Now the rise of the World Wide Web seems to have revived this smoldering controversy from the ashes.
sentences.translation: 如今，随着万维网的兴起，这一郁积的争议似乎又死灰复燃了。

sentences.sentence: A world war will leave only smoldering ashes as mute testimony of a human race whose folly led inexorably to ultimate death.
sentences.translation: 一场世界大战所留下的只是闷燃的灰烬，无声地证明了人类的愚蠢，最终无情地走向死亡。

sentences.sentence: Next to it was a giant, smoldering hunk of scrap metal.
sentences.translation: 旁边有一个冒着烟的巨大废金属块。
